name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="51" w="316">If the weather in the provided (current) world is raining, or thundering the entity will be extinguished.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_israining"></block></value><value
